review: Great service - our waiter was Shawn . He was so friendly and made our experience exceptional! They have great drink specials daily which will definitely make us come back again soon

This place is horrible. We waited an hour for a kids pasta a burger and there was no wait. When our son got his kids pasta you could tell it had been under a heat lamp for a LONG TIME! Â When the burger finally came out, it looked like this.... If you are looking for a place to eat, don't waste your time!
